Package org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration

Class RadialLinearTick

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.AxisContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.Tick
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.RadialLinearTick
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsLinearTick, IsNumericTick, IsScriptableFontProvider<ScaleContext>
    public class RadialLinearTick
extends Tick
implements IsLinearTick
    This object is used to map defined radial axis as linear.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
